summary: This bill, the "Colorado River Basin System Conservation Extension Act of 2025," reauthorizes a pilot program focused on water conservation within the Colorado River System. The act amends the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act of 2015 to extend the program's operational timeline. Specifically, it pushes a 2024 deadline to 2026 and another deadline from 2025 to 2027, effectively continuing the conservation program for an additional two years.
